summary: Contoso Wireless offers three streaming products: the Contoso Streamer, the Contoso Box, and the Contoso Plus. The Streamer offers access to streaming services such as Netflix and Hulu, while the Box and Plus offer access to over 500,000 and 1 million movies and TV shows respectively. All of these products require a monthly subscription fee, with the Streamer costing $9.99 per month, the Box costing $14.99 per month, and the Plus costing $19.99 per month. They all come with features such as 4K Ultra HD resolution, Dolby Atmos audio support, voice search capabilities, parental controls, and more. New customers can save 10% on their first month's subscription fee when they sign up for any one of these products, and all of them come with a 30-day money-back guarantee. Additionally, Contoso Wireless offers 24/7 customer service support in case you ever need help with your device.
